channel.title: Help server start troubles :l
channel.description: Ok so i know how to chang the variables in games and all that except for some reason when i click run to start a client itlls say stuff like like "blank source server started" and it just sits there....help please?and when i do load up a working client i dont know what server to use :/ if you can help me? thank youuu soooo muchh !

item.title: Help server start troubles :l
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

Download no-ip. In the IP spot on your client put that in that space. Open No-ip DUC (you get from website) Check off the little smily face. Start your server

Read full topic

item.title: Help server start troubles :l
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

Run your source and a black window should open up saying something like
soandsoscape is online!
or something like that. Now MINIMIZE THAT AND LEAVE IT OPEN. Open up your client folder and run that. When your client starts it will have a username:
Password:
IP:
Port:
options. Put in any username and pass like, Owner Bob, 1234. change the port to 43594 and change the ip to YOURSERVERIPHERE.no-ip.biz or whatever you used.

Read full topic

item.title: Help server start troubles :l
item.dc:creator: @staticfish1 staticfish1
item.description:
@staticfish1 wrote:

Uhm just download a source and client from here: http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/runescape-private-server-discussion/191692-great-server-source-download-list.html

and download a client from somewhere. Most work with each other.

Read full topic
